item.description: Just a harmless night of Pool & Martinis - you can have whatever beverage you wish. But martinis will be on the specials menu... The pool table is in the living room which is open to the dining room and kitchen which makes it great for hanging out and playing pool or games. Tthere is plenty of room for chatting or a board game or two. BYOB as always. I will have some food but if anyone wants to bring a some apps, snacks or fun finger food - it will be welcome. Thanks - R

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Booze & Billiards @ Roger's House
